Package org.codehaus.cargo.ant

Class ConfigurationElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.cargo.ant.ConfigurationElement
  • public class ConfigurationElement
extends Object
    Nested Ant element to wrap the DefaultConfigurationFactory class.
